subject: Re: Re: [junit] F****** Kama Sutra pics
msgSnippet: ... This suggestions is flawed. The worm has the capability to spam using multiple ids. It has got to be complete moderation. Dan, IIRC, you can have atmost 12
messageBody:
Anand Nene wrote:
> Meanwhile Mark (and moderators), you guys could zero in on those
> members using Windows and are active (since first such strike)
> and probably moderate them only. Other OS (Linux/Unix/Mac) users
> may be left unmoderated (Would save you guys some time till the
> issue is not sorted out). I see some moderators are windows
> users, so please moderate yourself as well.

This suggestions is flawed. The worm has the capability to spam
using multiple ids. It has got to be complete moderation.

Dan, IIRC, you can have atmost 12 moderators on Y! groups. But
choosing guys across different timezones works great.

Anand
--
